mustVisit.name: Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple
mustVisit.description: One of the largest functioning Hindu temples in the world, dedicated to Lord Vishnu.

mustVisit.name: Rockfort Temple
mustVisit.description: A historic fort complex with a temple perched on a rock, offering panoramic views of the city.

mustVisit.name: Srirangam Island
mustVisit.description: An island formed by the rivers Kaveri and Kollidam, housing the Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple.

famousFood: Traditional Tamil cuisine including dosa, idli, sambar, and rasam.
businessCulture: Diverse economy with industries like manufacturing, education, and tourism contributing significantly. Known for educational institutions and engineering industry.

mustVisit.name: Vedaranyam
mustVisit.description: Known for the Vedaranyeswarar Temple dedicated to Lord Shiva and the nearby mangrove forests of Muthupet.

mustVisit.name: Kodiyakkarai
mustVisit.description: A coastal town famous for its serene beaches and bird-watching opportunities, particularly during migratory bird seasons.

mustVisit.name: Velankanni
mustVisit.description: Renowned for the Velankanni Church and beautiful beaches.

famousFood: Fresh seafood dishes like fish curry, prawn masala, and crab fry.
businessCulture: Fishing, agriculture, tourism, salt production, and handicrafts contribute significantly to the economy.

mustVisit.name: Ooty
mustVisit.description: Known for its tea plantations, botanical gardens, and scenic beauty.

mustVisit.name: Coonoor
mustVisit.description: Famous for its picturesque landscapes, tea estates, and the Sim's Park botanical garden.

famousFood: Coimbatore is famous for its unique cuisine, including dishes like kozhikari, angannan biriyani, and idli with various chutneys.
businessCulture: Coimbatore is a major hub for textiles, manufacturing, and education. It's known for its entrepreneurial spirit and industrial development.

mustVisit.name: Kanyakumari
mustVisit.description: Renowned for its breathtaking sunrise, sunset views, and the Vivekananda Rock Memorial.

mustVisit.name: Courtallam
mustVisit.description: Known as the 'Spa of South India' for its numerous waterfalls and natural beauty.

famousFood: Tirunelveli is famous for its unique cuisine, including dishes like Iruttu Kadai Halwa, Ulunthu Kali, and Karupatti Mittai.
businessCulture: Tirunelveli is known for its agricultural products, especially paddy and coconuts. It also has a thriving handloom industry and is a major center for trade.

mustVisit.name: Yercaud
mustVisit.description: A hill station known for its pleasant climate, coffee plantations, and scenic viewpoints like Lady's Seat and Pagoda Point.

famousFood: Salem is famous for its unique cuisine, including dishes like Kal dosai, Mutton Chukka, and Biryani.
businessCulture: Salem is known for its agricultural produce, particularly mangoes. It also has a significant presence in the poultry and livestock industries.
